<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>

                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/noticia/2011/05/sobre-o-sportv.html" >Sobre o SporTV</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/programas/rio-2016/noticia/2016/02/globosat-realiza-processo-seletivo-para-os-jogos-olimpicos-do-rio.html" >Trabalhe Conosco</a></li>
                            


                        

    
                </ul>
            </div>

         </div>
    </div>
</div>

        
    








    <div class="footer product-color" data-ga-area="footer">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="column columns container" data-ga-marker="links">
            <ul class="first-line">

setActive(a){document.getElementById("main-menu-wrapper").removeAttribute("class");var b=document.getElementById(a);"iG_social"==a||document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),"active"==b.parentElement.getAttribute("class")?b.parentElement.setAttribute("class",""):b.parentElement.setAttribute("class","active")}function toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('.search-btn').on("click", function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            var str = $('#search-phrase').val();
            str = str.replace(/\s/g, "-");
            // console.log(str);
            // alert(str);

            if ($('#search-phrase').val().length > 0) {
                document.location.href = "/" + str;
            }
        })
    })
</script>

Manchester United ile balad kariyerinde hzla uluslararas bir ikona dönümesi ve dünyann en popüler futbolcularndan biri olmasnn altnda yatan bir baar formülü olmal.                 <a href="/stil-danismani/saciniz-istediginiz-gibi-olmadiginda-kurtariciniz-beyzbol-sapkasi" class="item_link">Saçnz istediiniz gibi olmadnda kurtarcnz: Beyzbol apkas</a>

                                        <div class="thumb one thumb-icon icon-image big">                        <img src="http://cdn1.gq.com.tr/files/img/620x405/17-03/24/cameron-fuller.png?0.5442552904706801" data-src-vertical="http://cdn1.gq.com.tr/files/img/vertical_b/17-03/24/cameron-fuller.png?0.5442552904706801" data-src-horizontal="http://cdn1.gq.com.tr/files/img/620x405/17-03/24/cameron-fuller.png?0.5442552904706801">
                    </div>
                    <div class="description">
                        <h2 title="Saçnz istediiniz gibi olmadnda kurtarcnz: Beyzbol apkas"><a href="/stil/stil-danismani" class="wrapper_cat_link">STL DANIMANI | </a>Saçnz istediiniz gibi olmadnda kurtarcnz: Beyzbol apkas</h2>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                    
                    <div class="boxes box-type-1 box-list-1 grid-item col-lg-8 col-md-6 col-sm-4 col-xs-4 content_pool_item_add content_pool_item" data-item-id="145853" data-order-no="14" data-order="14">
                <a href="/populer/kazanovanin-cazibesi-ve-bastan-cikarma-teknikleri" class="item_link">Kazanovann Cazibesi ve Batan Çkarma Teknikleri</a>
                <div class="wrapper_block">
                    <div class="thumb">                        <img src="http://cdn1.gq.com.tr/files/img/620x405/17-03/24/1-1490350211.jpg?0.9487249886722098" data-src-vertical="http://cdn1.gq.com.tr/files/img/vertical_b/17-03/24/1-1490350211.jpg?0.9487249886722098" data-src-horizontal="http://cdn1.gq.com.tr/files/img/620x405/17-03/24/1-1490350211.jpg?0.9487249886722098">
                    </div>
                    <div class="description">
                        <h2 title="Kazanovann Cazibesi ve Batan Çkarma Teknikleri"><a href="/populer" class="wrapper_cat_link">POPÜLER | </a>Kazanovann Cazibesi ve Batan Çkarma Teknikleri</h2>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            </div>

                    </div>
                                    <div class="item  col-lg-2 col-md-2 col-sm-2 inline-block">
                        <h4>DYG Radyolar</h4>
                        <ul>

        </div>
    </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function gaTracker(id) {
            $.getScript('//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js'); // jQuery shortcut
            window.ga = window.ga || function () {
                        (ga.q = ga.q || []).push(arguments)
                    };

            ga.l = +new Date;
            ga('create', id, 'auto');
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        }


        function gaTrack(path, title, page_no) {
            if (page_no != undefined) {
                if (path.indexOf("?") >= 0) {
                    path = path.substring(0, path.indexOf("?"));
                }
                path = path + "?p=" + page_no;
            }

            ga('set', {page: path, title: title});
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        }

        gaTracker("UA-29387850-1");
    </script>

    <script>
        if($.cookie('last_url'))
        {
            GQ.lastUrl = $.cookie('last_url');
        }

        $.cookie('last_url', '/', { path: '/' });
    </script>

    <!-- Begin BlueKai Tag -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        window.bk_async = function() {
            bk_allow_multiple_calls=true;
            bk_use_multiple_iframes=true;

            var bkKeywords = document.querySelector('meta[property="dmp:tags"]').getAttribute('content');

            if (bkKeywords) {
                window.bk_addPageCtx("Keywords", document.querySelector('meta[property="dmp:tags"]').getAttribute('content'));
            }

            BKTAG.doTag(43342, 1); };
        (function() {
            var scripts = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            var s = document.createElement('script');
            s.async = true;
            s.src = "http://tags.bkrtx.com/js/bk-coretag.js";
            scripts.parentNode.insertBefore(s, scripts);
        }());
    </script>
    <!-- End BlueKai Tag -->

    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('.search-btn').on("click", function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            var str = $('#search-phrase').val();
            str = str.replace(/\s/g, "-");
            // console.log(str);
            // alert(str);

            if ($('#search-phrase').val().length > 0) {
                document.location.href = "/" + str;
            }
        })
    })
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function gaTracker(id) {
            $.getScript('//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js'); // jQuery shortcut
            window.ga = window.ga || function () {
                        (ga.q = ga.q || []).push(arguments)
                    };

            ga.l = +new Date;
            ga('create', id, 'auto');
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        }


        function gaTrack(path, title, page_no) {
            if (page_no != undefined) {
                if (path.indexOf("?") >= 0) {
                    path = path.substring(0, path.indexOf("?"));
                }
                path = path + "?p=" + page_no;
            }

            ga('set', {page: path, title: title});
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        }

        gaTracker("UA-29387850-1");
    </script>

    <script>
        if($.cookie('last_url'))
        {
            GQ.lastUrl = $.cookie('last_url');
        }

        $.cookie('last_url', '/?p=2', { path: '/' });
    </script>

    <!-- Begin BlueKai Tag -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        window.bk_async = function() {
            bk_allow_multiple_calls=true;
            bk_use_multiple_iframes=true;

            var bkKeywords = document.querySelector('meta[property="dmp:tags"]').getAttribute('content');

            if (bkKeywords) {
                window.bk_addPageCtx("Keywords", document.querySelector('meta[property="dmp:tags"]').getAttribute('content'));
            }

            BKTAG.doTag(43342, 1); };
        (function() {
            var scripts = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            var s = document.createElement('script');
            s.async = true;
            s.src = "http://tags.bkrtx.com/js/bk-coretag.js";
            scripts.parentNode.insertBefore(s, scripts);
        }());
    </script>
    <!-- End BlueKai Tag -->

    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('.search-btn').on("click", function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            var str = $('#search-phrase').val();
            str = str.replace(/\s/g, "-");
            // console.log(str);
            // alert(str);

            if ($('#search-phrase').val().length > 0) {
                document.location.href = "/" + str;
            }
        })
    })
</script>

                </div>

                    <div class="boxes box-type-1 box-list-1 grid-item col-lg-8 col-md-6 col-sm-4 col-xs-4 content_pool_item_add content_pool_item" data-item-id="144373" data-order-no="7" data-order="7">

                    </div>

            </div>

                                    <div class="item  col-lg-2 col-md-2 col-sm-2 inline-block">
                        <h4>DYG Radyolar</h4>
                        <ul>
                                                            <li>
                                    <a href="http://www.ntvradyo.com.tr/" target="_blank">NTV Radyo</a>

                    </div>
                            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</footer></div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function gaTracker(id) {
            $.getScript('//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js'); // jQuery shortcut
            window.ga = window.ga || function () {
                        (ga.q = ga.q || []).push(arguments)
                    };

            ga.l = +new Date;
            ga('create', id, 'auto');
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        }


        function gaTrack(path, title, page_no) {
            if (page_no != undefined) {
                if (path.indexOf("?") >= 0) {
                    path = path.substring(0, path.indexOf("?"));
                }
                path = path + "?p=" + page_no;
            }

            ga('set', {page: path, title: title});
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        }

        gaTracker("UA-29387850-1");
    </script>

    <script>
        if($.cookie('last_url'))
        {
            GQ.lastUrl = $.cookie('last_url');
        }

        $.cookie('last_url', '/arguman', { path: '/' });
    </script>

    <!-- Begin BlueKai Tag -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        window.bk_async = function() {
            bk_allow_multiple_calls=true;
            bk_use_multiple_iframes=true;

            var bkKeywords = document.querySelector('meta[property="dmp:tags"]').getAttribute('content');

            if (bkKeywords) {
                window.bk_addPageCtx("Keywords", document.querySelector('meta[property="dmp:tags"]').getAttribute('content'));
            }

            BKTAG.doTag(43342, 1); };
        (function() {
            var scripts = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            var s = document.createElement('script');
            s.async = true;
            s.src = "http://tags.bkrtx.com/js/bk-coretag.js";
            scripts.parentNode.insertBefore(s, scripts);
        }());
    </script>
    <!-- End BlueKai Tag -->

    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('.search-btn').on("click", function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            var str = $('#search-phrase').val();
            str = str.replace(/\s/g, "-");
            // console.log(str);
            // alert(str);

            if ($('#search-phrase').val().length > 0) {
                document.location.href = "/" + str;
            }
        })
    })
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function gaTracker(id) {
            $.getScript('//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js'); // jQuery shortcut
            window.ga = window.ga || function () {
                        (ga.q = ga.q || []).push(arguments)
                    };

            ga.l = +new Date;
            ga('create', id, 'auto');
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        }


        function gaTrack(path, title, page_no) {
            if (page_no != undefined) {
                if (path.indexOf("?") >= 0) {
                    path = path.substring(0, path.indexOf("?"));
                }
                path = path + "?p=" + page_no;
            }

            ga('set', {page: path, title: title});
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        }

        gaTracker("UA-29387850-1");
    </script>

    <script>
        if($.cookie('last_url'))
        {
            GQ.lastUrl = $.cookie('last_url');
        }

        $.cookie('last_url', '/', { path: '/' });
    </script>

    <!-- Begin BlueKai Tag -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        window.bk_async = function() {
            bk_allow_multiple_calls=true;
            bk_use_multiple_iframes=true;

            var bkKeywords = document.querySelector('meta[property="dmp:tags"]').getAttribute('content');

            if (bkKeywords) {
                window.bk_addPageCtx("Keywords", document.querySelector('meta[property="dmp:tags"]').getAttribute('content'));
            }

            BKTAG.doTag(43342, 1); };
        (function() {
            var scripts = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            var s = document.createElement('script');
            s.async = true;
            s.src = "http://tags.bkrtx.com/js/bk-coretag.js";
            scripts.parentNode.insertBefore(s, scripts);
        }());
    </script>
    <!-- End BlueKai Tag -->

    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('.search-btn').on("click", function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            var str = $('#search-phrase').val();
            str = str.replace(/\s/g, "-");
            // console.log(str);
            // alert(str);

            if ($('#search-phrase').val().length > 0) {
                document.location.href = "/" + str;
            }
        })
    })
</script>

            <section id="topContentList" class="content-list-type-1 pull-push clearfix" data-fluid-grid="topContentList">
                <div class="left_content_2 col-lg-12 col-md-8 col-sm-8 col-xs-4" style="padding: 0;">
                                            <div id="widget_icerik_liste_5" class="widget widget_icerik_liste" data-design-widget-id="783"><div class="content_pool box-fluid-list clearfix" style="margin: 0;" data-content-pool-item-id="132794">

            
                    <div class="boxes box-type-1 box-list-1 grid-item col-lg-8 col-md-6 col-sm-4 col-xs-4 content_pool_item_add content_pool_item" data-item-id="145847" data-order-no="1" data-order="1">
                <a href="/populer/yogun-bir-is-gunu" class="item_link">Youn Bir  Günü</a>
                <div class="wrapper_block">
                    <div class="thumb">                        <img src="http://cdn1.gq.com.tr/files/img/620x405/17-03/23/00002620-1490280553.jpg?0.3952559775714597" data-src-vertical="http://cdn1.gq.com.tr/files/img/vertical_b/17-03/23/00002620-1490280553.jpg?0.3952559775714597" data-src-horizontal="http://cdn1.gq.com.tr/files/img/620x405/17-03/23/00002620-1490280553.jpg?0.3952559775714597">
                    </div>
                    <div class="description">
                        <h2 title="Youn Bir  Günü"><a href="/gq-tv/populer" class="wrapper_cat_link">POPÜLER | </a>Youn Bir  Günü</h2>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                    
                    <div class="boxes box-type-1 box-list-1 grid-item col-lg-8 col-md-6 col-sm-4 col-xs-4 content_pool_item_add content_pool_item" data-item-id="145466" data-order-no="2" data-order="2">

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function gaTracker(id) {
            $.getScript('//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js'); // jQuery shortcut
            window.ga = window.ga || function () {
                        (ga.q = ga.q || []).push(arguments)
                    };

            ga.l = +new Date;
            ga('create', id, 'auto');
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        }


        function gaTrack(path, title, page_no) {
            if (page_no != undefined) {
